program agc003c
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i, diff, bin, ans
    type entry
        integer :: value
        integer :: index
    end type entry
    type(entry), dimension(:), allocatable :: entries
    integer :: n
    read(*,*) N

    allocate(entries(N), stat=alloc_err)
    if ( alloc_err /=0 ) stop "allocation failure"

    do i=1,N
        read(*,*) entries(i)%value
        entries(i)%index = i-1 ! 0-based
    end do

    call sort_entries(entries)  ' will define later

    diff=0
    bin=0 do i=1,N
        integer :: current_idx = entries(i)%index
        integer bin_parity = mod(bin,2)
        if ( bin_parity /= mod(current_idx,2) ) then
            diff = diff +1
        end if
        bin = 1 - bin  ' toggles between 0 and1
    end do

    ans = diff/2
    write(*,*) ans

contains

    subroutine swap_entries(a,b)
        type(entry), intent(inout) :: a, b
        type(entry) temp
        temp = a
        a = b
        b = temp
    end subroutine swap_entries

    recursive subroutine sort_entries(arr)
        type(entry), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: arr
        call qsort(arr, 1, size(arr))
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
end subroutine

    recursive subroutine qsort(arr, first, last)
        type(entry), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: arr
        integer, intent(in) :: first, last
        integer :: i, j
        type(entry) pivot_val

        if (first >= last) return

        i = first
        j = last
        pivot_val = arr( (first + last)/2 )

        do
            do while ( arr(i)%value < pivot_val%value ) i =i+1
            enddo
            do while ( pivot_val%value < arr(j)%value ) j=j-1
            enddo
            if (i <=j ) then
                call swap_entries(arr(i), arr(j)) i = i+1
                j =j-1
            else
                exit
            endif
        enddo

        call qsort(arr, first, j)
        call qsort(arr, i, last)

    end subroutine qsort

end program agc003c

program agc003c
    implicit none
    integer :: N, i, diff, bin, ans
    type entry
        integer :: value
        integer :: index
    end type entry
    type(entry), dimension(:), allocatable :: entries
    integer :: n
    read(*,*) N

    allocate(entries(N), stat=alloc_err)
    if ( alloc_err /=0 ) stop "allocation failure"

    do i=1,N
        read(*,*) entries(i)%value
        entries(i)%index = i-1 ! 0-based
    end do

    call sort_entries(entries)  ' will define later

    diff=0
    bin=0
    do i=1,N
        integer :: current_idx = entries(i)%index
        integer bin_parity = mod(bin,2)
        if ( bin_parity /= mod(current_idx,2) ) then
            diff = diff +1
        end if
        bin = 1 - bin  ' toggles between 0 and1
    end do

    ans = diff/2
    write(*,*) ans

contains

    subroutine swap_entries(a,b)
        type(entry), intent(inout) :: a, b
        type(entry) temp
        temp = a
        a = b
        b = temp
    end subroutine swap_entries

    recursive subroutine sort_entries(arr)
        type(entry), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: arr
        call qsort(arr, 1, size(arr))
    end subroutine

    recursive subroutine qsort(arr, first, last)
        type(entry), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: arr
        integer, intent(in) :: first, last
        integer :: i, j
        type(entry) pivot_val

        if (first >= last) return

        i = first
        j = last
        pivot_val = arr( (first + last)/2 )

        do
            do while ( arr(i)%value < pivot_val%value )
                i =i+1
            enddo
            do while ( pivot_val%value < arr(j)%value )
                j=j-1
            enddo
            if (i <=j ) then
                call swap_entries(arr(i), arr(j))
                i = i+1
                j =j-1
            else
                exit
            endif
        enddo

        call qsort(arr, first, j)
        call qsort(arr, i, last)

    end subroutine qsort

end program agc003c
